ack.p: We thank the two anonymous referees for their constructive feedback, which has led to improvements in our manuscript. We acknowledge the E-OBS dataset from the EU-FP6 project ENSEMBLES ( http://ensembles-eu.metoffice.com) and the data providers in the ECA&D project ( http://www.ecad.eu). We also acknowledge the JRC-MARS dataset from MARS-AGRI4CAST ( http://agri4cast.jrc.ec.europa.eu). We are very grateful to Phillipe Reynaud from ANSES, the French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health & Safety for providing data on B. tabaci and T. vaporariorum in France.
